item.description:
How To Track Customer Acquisitions :

Customer Lifecycle, Sales Funnel, and Content Strategy This article will walk you through the customer acquisition funnel for SaaS companies. The primary goal is to help you design, analyze, and optimize your customer acquisition process.

item.title: 21 Best Things I Learned From Over 50 SEO Courses
item.description:
21 Best Things I Learned From Over 50 SEO Courses

Over the past 7 years, I've read and watched over 50 SEO courses. There are only 21 SEO tips you need to out-optimize competitors for your target keywords in any industry.

item.title: Zero to Million Dollar Run Rate - A Story of Growth & Hustle ft. Avanoo
item.description:
Zero to Million Dollar Run Rate - A Story of Growth & Hustle ft. Avanoo

Avanoo is a 500 Startups Batch 12 company that went from being a zero dollar business to hitting a million dollar run rate by the time they got to Demo Day this past June.

item.title: To Build Great Products, Build This Strong, Scalable System First
item.description:
To Build Great Products, Build This Strong, Scalable System First

and Kavin Stewart have a fairly unusual "how we met" story. Today, the two are oddly (but aptly) co-VPs of Product at . But when they first encountered each other eight years ago, they were founders of competing social gaming startups.

item.title: Units of Value: A Framework for Scaling
item.description:
Units of Value: A Framework for Scaling

A quick introduction of myself, more so you can understand the biases I'm coming from and how I look at the world. I'm an investing partner at which is a venture capital firm that's backed both consumer internet companies like Facebook, LinkedIn, and Pandora from investment a year ago in Greylock, but also large enterprise software companies is a open source container technology.

item.title: A Fully Loaded SaaS Marketing Stack
item.description:
A Fully Loaded SaaS Marketing Stack

A strange professional pastime of mine these days has been swapping notes on marketing and growth tools. I'm a nerd, I know. But you're like me, you aren't just thinking about tools you're also thinking how a tool fits into an agreeable combination or "stack."

item.title: How To Pitch A VC
item.description:
How To Pitch A VC

"Everyone" understands the high-level goals of a pitch: Make yourself memorable, and drive home your product's value. But working out how to put it all into one, non-boring pitch is another matter altogether -- and something we work on extensively as part of the 500 Accelerator.

item.title: 4 Ways Copywriting Can Boost Your E-commerce Conversion Rates
item.description:
4 Ways Copywriting Can Boost Your E-commerce Conversion Rates

Make your copy work more effectively for your e-commerce brand by matching the language to the intended audience.
